description: Try our easy to follow Crispy Fish With Papaya & Coconut Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fish dishes,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Barramundi,Fish,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Crispy Fish With Papaya & Coconut Salsa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the salsa, combine coconut water, lime juice, fish sauce and finely chopped chilli together in a bowl. Add shredded cabbage, papaya, sliced onion, and coriander mix well and set aside.
Combine flour, ground coriander and ginger in a shallow bowl. Dip each fish fillet in egg on both sides, then coat in flour mixture, pressing on firmly.
Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add fillets and cook for 3-4 minutes each side or until golden and crisp. Transfer to plates, top with salsa to serve.
